result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffrey Andre Love

records.addlTxt: Scheduling Order; signed and filed.
Received and Filed.

Defendant Jeffrey Andre Love in court, in custody.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court for Jeffrey Andre Love.  Attorney Samuel E. Simpson in court for State of Wisconsin. Case is calendared for final pretrial. State has filed a motion to adjourn, no objection from defense. Court grants adjournment and vacates current jury trial date. State will revoke offer at next final pretrial. Scheduling order signed and filed. Case is adjourned in Branch 36.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury status hearing scheduled for January 23, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 30, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Received and filed; forwarded to the Judge for review.
Order to Produce.  Signed and Filed.  nk
Order to Produce.  Signed and Filed.  nk

Defendant Jeffrey Andre Love not in court, in custody.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont appeared by video for Jeffrey Andre Love.  Defendant's appearance waived. Attorney Samuel E. Simpson in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for final pretrial. Defense requested adjournment due to defendant not being produced. Court granted defense's request. Jury trial remains calendared for October 17, 2022 at 8:30 am. Final pre-trial scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
State's Requested Jury Instructions.  Received and Filed.  nk
Order to Produce.  Signed and Filed.  nk
Received and Filed: Notice of Expert Testimony
State's Witness List
State's Motion in Limine

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Jeffrey Andre Love not in court, in custody, appearance waived.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case was brought in early to address setting trial dates. Case is adjourned.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Laura A. Crivello, Branch 36,  in Room 608 of the Courthouse.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Jeffrey Andre Love not in court, in custody.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW 
Case set for scheduling conference. Defense counsel received discovery and offer and request case set for plea and sentencing hearing.  Court orders case for adjourned, Branch 38.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Jeffrey Andre Love not in court, in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for Motion hearing. Defense has not filed a motion and request matter set over for scheduling. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Jeffrey Andre Love not in court, in custody.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for scheduling conference. Defense counsel received discovery and offer and request case set for motion hearing.  Court orders case for adjourned, Branch 38.  Motion hearing scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Jeffrey Andre Love in court with Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont; both appear by video.  Defendant Jeffrey Andre Love in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Court took judicial notice of 15CF294. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer N. Malafa. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. Case is adjourned to Branch 38.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Mary Garvin Guimont; filed.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jeffrey Andre Love in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Jeffrey Andre Love in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jeffrey Andre Love appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 10:00 am.
